original_text: Was anyone at the time of his call already circumcised? Let him not seek to remove the marks of circumcision. Was anyone at the time of his call uncircumcised? Let him not seek circumcision.
korean_text: 할례자로서 부르심을 받은 자가 있느냐 무할례자가 되지 말며 무할례자로 부르심을 받은 자가 있느냐 할례를 받지 말라

sentences.original_text: Was anyone at the time of his call already circumcised?
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 부르심을 받을 때에 이미 할례를 받은 자가 있었느냐?

sentences.original_text: Let him not seek to remove the marks of circumcision.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 할례의 흔적을 없애려고 하지 말라.

sentences.original_text: Was anyone at the time of his call uncircumcised?
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 부르심을 받을 때에 할례받지 않은 자가 있었느냐?
